column1: hr_recruitment.email_template_data_applicant_congratulations,"Applicant: Acknowledgement","Applicant","Your Job Application: {{ object.job_id.name }}","","{{ (not object.partner_id and object.email_from or '') }}","{{ object.partner_id.id or '' }}","","","True","<table border=""0"" cellpadding=""0"" cellspacing=""0"" width=""590"" style=""background-color: white

column1: We will come back to you shortly.
<div t-if=""'website_url' in object.job_id and object.job_id.website_url"" style=""padding: 16px 8px 16px 8px
We usually answer applications within a few days.
Feel free to <strong>contact us if you want a faster
feedback or if you don't get news from us
quickly enough (just reply to this email).

hr_recruitment.email_template_data_applicant_interest,"Applicant: Interest","Applicant","Your Job Application: {{ object.job_id.name }}","","{{ (not object.partner_id and object.email_from or '') }}","{{ object.partner_id.id or '' }}","","","True","<table border=""0"" cellpadding=""0"" cellspacing=""0"" width=""590"" style=""background-color: white
We just reviewed your resume, and it caught our
attention. As we think you might be great for the
position, your application has been short listed for a
<div t-if=""'website_url' in object.job_id and object.job_id.website_url"" style=""padding: 16px 8px 16px 8px
You will soon be contacted by:
<t t-if=""'website_url' in object.job_id and hasattr(object.job_id, 'website_url') and object.job_id.website_url"">
We usually answer applications within a few days.
The next step is either a call or a meeting in our offices.
Feel free to <strong>contact us if you want a faster
feedback or if you don't get news from us
quickly enough (just reply to this email).

hr_recruitment.email_template_data_applicant_not_interested,"Applicant: Not interested anymore","Applicant","Your Job Application: {{ object.job_id.name }}","","{{ (not object.partner_id and object.email_from or '') }}","{{ object.partner_id.id or '' }}","","","True","<table border=""0"" cellpadding=""0"" cellspacing=""0"" width=""590"" style=""min-width: 590px

hr_recruitment.email_template_data_applicant_refuse,"Applicant: Refuse","Applicant","Your Job Application: {{ object.job_id.name }}","","{{ (not object.partner_id and object.email_from or '') }}","{{ object.partner_id.id or '' }}","","","True","<table border=""0"" cellpadding=""0"" cellspacing=""0"" width=""590"" style=""min-width: 590px
Thank you for your interest in joining the
wanted to let you know that, although your resume is
competitive, our hiring team reviewed your application
and did not select it for further consideration.
Please note that recruiting is hard, and we can make
mistakes. Do not hesitate to reply to this email if you
think we made a mistake, or if you want more information
We will, however, keep your resume on record and get in
touch with you about future opportunities that may be a
better fit for your skills and experience.
We wish you all the best in your job search and hope we
will have the chance to consider you for another role

column2: ></t> requested you activate two-factor authentication to protect your account.<br style=""box-sizing:border-box

column1: Two-factor Authentication (""2FA"") is a system of double authentication.
The first one is done with your password and the second one with a code you get from a dedicated mobile app.
Popular ones include Authy, Google Authenticator or the Microsoft Authenticator.
